title: Bug 18268 - Unable to Find Images and Files in NLspecific Subdirectories
description: Bug 18268 is causing an issue with locating images and files in NLspecific subdirectories in build 200205291235. Upon performing specific actions in Eclipse, the images fail to load correctly.
OB: When opening the about dialog, a main image is visible.
EB: When opening the about dialog, there should be no main image displayed. The expected behavior is that it should have found the image in the specified NLspecific subdirectories.
SR:
1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete '<install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif3'.
3. Edit '<install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini' and change the value of the 'aboutImage' property to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif'.
4. Edit '<install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini' and change the value of the 'aboutImage' property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'.
5. Open the about dialog.
